thing-type.label: PSMZ0001 Plug module
thing-type.description: Plug module<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtPower Plug with Energy Monitoring,</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtWhen a PSMZ0001 that is not associated to a Z-Wave Network, is inserted into the mains outlet, it will flash once red followed by 2 green flashes followed by steady red flashing. The PSMZ0001 can now be added to (=inclusion) or removed from (=exclusion) a Z-Wave network:</p&gt <ol&gt<li&gtstart inclusion/exclusion on the primary controller</li&gt <li&gthold the touch button until the led shows green light</li&gt <li&gtrelease the touch button. The PSMZ0001 will confirm successful addition to the network by 5 green flashes.</li&gt </ol&gt<br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtWhen a PSMZ0001 that is not associated to a Z-Wave network is inserted into the mains outlet, it will flash once red followed by 2 green flashes followed by steady red flashing. The PSMZ0001 can now be added to (=inclusion) or removed from (=exclusion) a Z-Wave network:</p&gt <ol&gt<li&gtstart inclusion/exclusion on the primary controller</li&gt <li&gthold the touch button until the led shows green light</li&gt <li&gtrelease the touch button. The PSMZ0001will confirm successful removal/exclusion by steady red flashing. At the time of exclusion the device is factory reset.</li&gt </ol&gt

parameter.label: 31: Local Control
parameter.description: Local Control ON/OFF<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtf LocalControlOn is set (factory default state) the PMSZ001s output can be switched manually by the touch button. If LocalControlOff is set, the PMSZ0001s output can only be switched through Z-Wave telegrams. In both modes the operational state of the mechanical switch is reported to association group 2</p&gt</p&gt
